description:
By 1874, seven years have passed since the end of the samurai era. A former samurai, Shizuma Orikasa works as a rickshaw driver in Tokyo while looking for his fiancée, Sumie Kanomata, who went missing during the Boshin War. Shizuma thwarts an assassination attempt and joins the newly established police department, where he’ll fight to stop dark forces from overthrowing the government.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/EdoHaruma)

Animator, Character Designer & Storyboard Artist affiliated with Dandelion Animation Studio. Originally from Mexico.

[Tumblr](https://coralienagel.tumblr.com/)

Art Director at Sun Creature Studio.

[Website](https://www.gintomatoes.com/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/gintomatoes)

Multidisciplinary French artist. 2006 graduate of EMCA in Angoulême.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kenarto) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ken_arto/)

Ken Arto is a half French half Japanese man, having a French father and Japanese mother. He is an animator for many popular series and debuted as an animator for anime in "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind". He had a love for animation and drawing since a young age, and graduated from the Academy of Clermont-Ferrand in artistic trades

_Note: Not to be confused with [大野真依](https://anilist.co/staff/309569/)._

Currently affiliated with Tsumugi Akita Anime Lab.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 10 - The River Never Stops, Nor Carries The Same Water Twice
